name: KBA Challenge 2019
how_transparency: n/a
how_toy: The competition awards 'Kudos' and 'Does not award Points or Medals', indicating it is for practice and learning rather than a serious deployment challenge.

name: Data Science - French Actuary Institute
how_transparency: n/a
how_toy: The competition prize is listed as 'Knowledge' and it 'Does not award Points or Medals', indicating it is for educational or practice purposes rather than a production-focused challenge.

name: Workshop Data Science
how_data_privacy: The data description states that several fields were anonymized to protect privacy. Quote: 'User_ID - an anonymous id unique to a given customer... Ocupation - ocupation anonymoused City_category - city category anonymoused'.
how_transparency: The rules encourage open sharing of code among all participants, which promotes transparency. Quote: 'It's okay to share code if made available to all participants on the forums.'
how_toy: The competition is explicitly for educational purposes and offers no significant rewards. Quote: 'Limited to data science workshop participants' and 'Does not award Points or Medals'.

name: BizInnovate 2023
how_data_privacy: The data description notes a step taken to protect individuals: "Note that the geocoordinates may not be exact, as they may have been “jittered” randomly up to 2km for urban clusters and 10km for rural clusters to protect survey participant privacy."
how_transparency: The rules mandate reproducibility and code submission: "Your submission must be fully reproducible by the contest organizers...You will also need to send your source code...to admin@pca2023.com."
how_model_use: The rules require the winner to license their submission for future use: "You hereby license and will license your winning Submission and the source code used to generate the Submission under an Open Source Initiative-approved license...that in no event limits commercial use..."
how_toy: The competition does not award significant prizes, indicating a focus on learning: "Prizes & Awards. Kudos. Does not award Points or Medals"

name: Data Science - MASTER EN BIG DATA ANALYTICS
how_transparency: RESUMEN: se debe entregar una explicación de la(s) propuesta(s) (5 puntos). The competition requires participants to submit a written explanation of their proposed solution(s), which contributes to methodological transparency.
how_model_use: Resuelto el desafío, crear una aplicación para un usuario o para la misma empresa sería inmediato y sobretodo muy útil. This states that once the challenge is solved, creating a useful application for the company would be an immediate next step.
how_toy: MÁSTER EN BIG DATA ANALYTICS... La nota (de 0 a 10 puntos) se calculará a partir de... The competition is part of a Master's program, is graded, and does not award prizes, indicating its educational purpose.

name: Data Science Summer2 Osaka
how_transparency: The competition encourages sharing solutions by asking participants to make their notebooks public. Quote: '是非ともコンペ終了後にNotebookの公開設定をPublicにしましょう。たとえ小さくても知見を公開して、Kaggleコミュニティ全体に貢献しましょう。' (Let's make the Notebook public after the competition ends...)
how_model_use: The competition concludes with a presentation of the top solutions. Quote: '最終発表・上位者の表彰およびソリューション発表' (Final announcement, awards for top performers, and solution presentations).
how_toy: The competition is described as a study hackathon for beginners and does not award official points or medals. Quote: 'This competition is a study hackathon for the local data science community in Japan...初心者の方こそ是非とも積極的にご参加ください！'

name: Group Project
how_transparency: n/a
how_toy: The competition is linked to a course and offers no significant prizes, indicating an educational purpose. Quote: 'You have a dataset (provided on the course NYU classes site)...' and 'Prizes & Awards Kudos Does not award Points or Medals'.

name: Classification of English Learner Proficiency
how_transparency: The text explains the origin of the dataset, stating: "The data provided in this challenge comes from an extraction of a past scientific competition."
how_toy: The competition is for practice as it offers no significant rewards: "Prizes & Awards Kudos Does not award Points or Medals".

name: HSU Data Science Challenge SS23
how_transparency: The origin of the data is stated, and the evaluation metric is clearly defined with its formula. Quote: "you will work together in groups of two on the NASA bearing dataset...Your results file will be evaluated via the F1-score metric."
how_toy: The competition is explicitly for a university course and offers no prizes, indicating an educational purpose. Quote: "Welcome to the HSU Data Science Challenge, for the course 'Programming and Computational Methods of Data Science'...Does not award Points or Medals"

name: CareerCon 2019 - Help Navigate Robots
how_data_privacy: The rules discuss secure handling of the competition data: "You agree to use reasonable and suitable measures to prevent persons who have not formally agreed to these Rules from gaining access to the Competition Data."
how_transparency: The data origin is explained: "The data for this competition has been collected by Heikki Huttunen and Francesco Lomio from the Department of Signal Processing...both from Tampere University, Finland."
how_toy: The competition is described as educational and for practice: "CareerCon is a digital event all about landing your first data science job...Ahead of the event, we have a fun competition to get you started." Prizes are swag, not monetary.

name: Data Science Lab - Spring 2023
how_data_privacy: The competition states that features are anonymized: 'The meanings of the features were not revealed by the data provider for privacy reasons.'
how_transparency: The competition encourages reproducibility to ensure transparency in methods: 'Setting a random seed (e.g., SEED=42) will allow for reproducibility.'
how_model_use: The competition results are used for academic assessment: 'The Kaggle Competition final grade (Private LB position + report) counts for 20% of the grade.'
how_toy: The competition is part of a university course and is for a grade, not a commercial application: 'Welcome to the UT ECE460J Spring 2023 Kaggle Competition!'

name: Библиотеки для DS2 - 803
how_transparency: n/a
how_toy: The competition does not award points or medals, indicating it is for educational or practice purposes rather than a high-stakes challenge. Quote: 'Does not award Points or Medals'

name: Practical Innovative Analytics Data Science 2023
how_transparency: n/a
how_toy: The competition does not offer significant prizes, points, or medals, suggesting it is for practice or educational purposes. Quote: 'Prizes & Awards Kudos Does not award Points or Medals'

name: Machine Learning Competition
how_transparency: The competition provides a link to the original data source for details on the data attributes. Quote: 'More information about the attributes of data can be found https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/bank+marketing#.'
how_toy: The competition is framed as an educational exercise for a course and does not offer points or medals. Quote: 'This is the right time to apply everything you have learned so far... Prizes & Awards Kudos Does not award Points or Medals'

name: Data Science: Asset Price Prediction
how_transparency: The evaluation process is explained: "ข้อมูล test 50% จะวัดผลใน Public Leaderboard มีวัตถุประสงค์เพื่อใช้พัฒนา model...ข้อมูล test อีก 50% จะวัดผลใน Private Leaderboard...จะใช้ Metric: Mean Absolute Percentage Error (MAPE)"
how_toy: The competition is for assessment or practice as it is part of a 'Hackathon Individual Test' and the prize section states it 'Does not award Points or Medals'.

name: SSSSO Khammam Medchal Competition
how_transparency: The evaluation process is explained: 'The evaluation metric for this competition is Mean F1-Score. The F1 score, commonly used in information retrieval, measures accuracy using the statistics precision p and recall r.'
how_toy: The competition is part of a training program and offers no significant prizes: 'Welcome to the final leg of your training program.' and 'Does not award Points or Medals'.

name: Flavours of Physics: Finding τ  →  μμμ
how_fairness: The metric includes checks to ensure unbiased results. "The metric used in this challenge includes checks that physicists do in their analysis to make sure the results are unbiased."
how_transparency: The competition provides GitHub links to the implementation of its custom evaluation checks. "Please check out the github repo to learn more about how the agreement test is implemented."
how_explainability: n/a - Weighted Area Under the ROC Curve
how_model_use: There is a specific award for the model most useful for the experiment, with criteria including production suitability. "An award will be given to the team that... creates a model that is most useful for the LHCb experiment... The suitability for use in production"
how_toy: n/a

name: Human Activity Recognition Using Smartphones Data Set
how_transparency: The competition provides detailed information about the data features in separate files, promoting transparency. Quote: "If you want to have the names of the features, please take a look at the files 'feature_label.txt' and 'features.txt'."
how_toy: The competition is framed as an educational exercise with no significant prize. Quote: "With the in-class competition you will get another chance to sharpen your prediction skills." and "Prizes & Awards: Knowledge. Does not award Points or Medals"

name: Tweet Sentiment Extraction
how_transparency: The source of the dataset is explained and licensed: 'The dataset is titled Sentiment Analysis: Emotion in Text tweets with existing sentiment labels, used here under creative commons attribution 4.0. international licence.'
how_model_use: Winning solutions must be licensed under an open source license 'that in no event limits commercial use of such code or model containing or depending on such code.'
how_toy: n/a

name: MBI Big Data & Data Science Competition
how_transparency: The creation of the dataset is explained: 'I built a scraper for a school project and expanded upon it later to create this dataset which includes every used vehicle entry within the United States on Craigslist.'
how_toy: The competition is described as originating from a 'school project' and it 'Does not award Points or Medals', which indicates it's for learning or practice.
